title: Sampler Blanket #2
medium:
Medium: wool, polyester
Technique: needle punched wool and wool applique with machine embroidery
description: Dark brown background with a taupe band at the bottom. Most of the field is occupied by a large patterned light green squirrel eating a nut, sitting on a branch. In the upper right corner, pink lettering. Machine embroidered leaf forms in light purple.
